review: I really do enjoy this game, this game is very difficult when you start, but as you progress you get better guns, equipment and skill.
You love WWII games? Try this game out! Its fun and extremely easy to catch on.

It's a great game, but not worth 60$. Buy the game when it's on sale otherwise don't really buy it. I did buy season pass and I think it's worth it. Are you wondering if it's a good game? Sure buy you'll have fun.
